title: Sissy-Boy Slap-Party
creator_credit: Meg McMillan, Phyllis Lang, Jody Shapiro, Guy Maddin and Réjean Labrie
brief_description: Sailors on an island paradise don’t have a worry in the world — until a playful gesture is interpreted as an act of wilful aggression in Guy Maddin’s experimental short. Soon, the innocent act of slight slapping becomes a relentless orgy of face-smacking.

constellations_other.name: Using the silent film aesthetic
constellations_other.description: Explore how contemporary filmmakers use visual references to the silent era to convey information to a film literate audience.

creator_credit_for_label: Meg McMillan, Phyllis Lang, Jody Shapiro, Guy Maddin and Réjean Labrie
description: Sailors in repose on an island paradise seemingly have no worries of war or danger — until a playful gesture is interpreted as an act of wilful aggression. Soon, the innocent act of slight slapping becomes a relentless and unforgiving orgy of open-palmed face-smacking.
